description: The BlackSuit ransomware gang is behind CDK Global's massive IT outage and disruption to car dealerships across North America, according to multiple sources familiar with the matter. [...]
title: CDK Global outage caused by BlackSuit ransomware attack

description: An open-source Android malware named 'Ratel RAT' is widely deployed by multiple cybercriminals to attack outdated devices, some aiming to lock them down with a ransomware module that demands payment on Telegram. [...]
title: Ratel RAT targets outdated Android phones in ransomware attacks
